name: ZMAAASH!! Pinball Edition
description:
ZPE is a unique pinball game with amazing effects and an exciting new way to score ! Fight massive hordes of zombies. Destroy everything in your path, all things must come to an end !
1. Defeat your enemy ! 2. Cross the valley of death ! 3. There is something in the cave. 4. It has been imprisoned hermit. 5. Finally, arrive at the Demon Castle !
Enjoy random encounters with demon zombies and their special stages ! [[[[[[[[[[ How To Play ]]]]]]]]]]]
Keyboard input 【A】key.　　　　　- Left flipper - 【L】key.　　　　　- Right flipper - 【SPACE】key.　- Nudging - 【Enter】key.　　 - Pause - 【Esc】key.　　　　- Back to the title -

Controller input 【Fire1】Button.　　- Left flipper - 【Fire2】Button.　　- Right flipper - 【Jump】Button.　　- Nudging - 【Submit】Button.　- Pause - 【Cancel】Button.　- Back to the title -

(Please set the Unity configuration)

[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]] Come grab a beer and let's play some pinball ! Install instructions Step 1　Download file Step 2　Extract zip file Step 3　Play game　: )
